parts.text: Please address my problem with calls being dropped all the time

The signal service in my neighbourhood is only one or two bars i live one minute walk from the signal tower. I have too many dropped calls.

My service is constantly dropping calls when I am trying to work from home. Worse than that, the phone will sometimes be disconnected and I end up not receiving any chat messages or voice messages from the period of time the connection is dropped
